skills.title: Web Development
skills.description: Experienced in Python, Django, JavaScript, Node.js, Angular, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap.

skills.title: Mobile App Development
skills.description: Skilled in Java, Android Studio, and creating dynamic and interactive apps.

skills.title: Machine Learning
skills.description: Proficient in TensorFlow, Keras, OpenCV, Scikit-learn, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, and image classification.

skills.title: Embedded Systems
skills.description: Knowledgeable in C, FreeRTOS, TI RM46 microcontroller, I2C, UART, and temperature sensors.

portfolio.title: Dog Breed Identifier
portfolio.description: Python program that utilizes a pre-trained ResNet50V2 model to classify images of dogs into their respective breeds.

portfolio.title: SuperTyper - Typing Game
portfolio.description: A fun and challenging typing game where you can enhance your typing skills while enjoying superhero adventures.

portfolio.title: Bricks Be Gone
portfolio.description: A fun and addictive android game where the player's objective is to break all the bricks using a paddle and a bouncing ball.
